title: Tale As Old As Zeit 1/11: Rachel Maddow, Maya Angelou, Kool Moe Dee, Reese Witherspoon, Brooklyn Walkout, United Airlines
itunes:title: Tale As Old As Zeit 1/11: Rachel Maddow, Maya Angelou, Kool Moe Dee, Reese Witherspoon, Brooklyn Walkout, United Airlines
description:
In this edition of Tale As Old As Zeit, Jack and Miles discuss Rachel Maddow being too SCARED to debate Madison Cawthorn, Maya Angelou being the first Black woman featured on the US quarter, Kool Moe Dee's rapper report card, Reese Witherspoon's predictions for the future of the metaverse, the Brooklyn student walkout, and United reporting no COVID deaths after vaccine mandate.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
